frontmatter.title: Blockquote
frontmatter.description: The blockquote element is used to indicate the quotation of a large section of text from another source.

frontmatter.title: Code
frontmatter.description: The code element is used for code and syntax highlighting.

frontmatter.title: Heading
frontmatter.description: The heading element is used to indicate the quotation of a large section of text from another source.

frontmatter.title: Horizontal Rule
frontmatter.description: The `<hr />` tag in HTML stands for horizontal rule and is used to insert a horizontal rule or a thematic break in an HTML page to divide or separate document sections.

frontmatter.title: Image
frontmatter.description: Image element exists to have a future possibility to optimize and add features.

frontmatter.title: Ingress
frontmatter.description: Ingress is a brief, introductory paragraph that follows immediately after the title of an article.

frontmatter.title: Lead
frontmatter.description: A lead paragraph is the opening paragraph of an article, etc.

frontmatter.title: Lists
frontmatter.description: Lists are used to specify lists of information.

frontmatter.title: Paragraph
frontmatter.description: Paragraphs are block-level elements, used to structure and format text contents.

frontmatter.title: Span
frontmatter.description: Spans are inline-elements, used to define parts of text content.
